titles.title: Corporate Responsibility for Child Labor Elimination Act of 2023
Corporate Responsibility for Child Labor Elimination Act of 2023
A bill to require certain businesses to disclose and eradicate the use of unlawful child labor in their supply chain, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
